column1: hi bro, is being a while now. i was at your work place for a rim for my   e46. i already have rim 17 but looking for size 18. wow i couldn't agree with you more rev. smiling is a way of expressing your thoughts on how you feel. what's your take on this? what a wow hmmm, we live to see mr president our angel has left us when we needed her most. damirifa due, awo baatan pa. be thankful to lord in spite of the challenges. a smile is a way of writing your thoughts on your face, telling others that they are accepted, liked and appreciated. breaking news; the match you are watching is a video game, the real one will be played same time tomorrow according to fifa i've just updated my professional profile on linkedin. connect with me and view my profile. #in who says your situation cannot change? with god, there’s nothing like ‘too late’, ‘too bad’ or ‘too difficult’. son, always distinguish yourself with your footprints, and do not limit yourself to what you are told to do. one mistake is enough to lose a job. one touch is enough to heal a wounded heart.
